comments:
Description:
NPE when open attached report and transfer to layout.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report
2. Transfer to Layout.

Expected result:
This report should be able to transfer back to Layout

Actual result:
A Warning dialog to edit xml source and NPE:
java.lang.NullPointerException

1. The page can not transfer to layout editor.This is right for the design file is invalid.
2. For the layout is swithched back to preview, need check if the layout is really created in the onBroughtTop method.
